## Garlic Bread

<span class="mh">Servings:</span> 2-3 servings
<br>

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>&frac13; cup vegan butter</li>
  <li>4 cloves garlic, finely minced</li>
  <li>6 slices of bread (at least 1in thick)</li>
  <br>
  <li><i>Optional Additions</i>
    <ul>
      <li>Parsley, minced</li>
      <li>Vegan Parmesan, grated</li>
      <li>Salt and pepper, to taste</li>
    </ul>
  </li>

</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Preheat oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper</li>
  <li>Melt vegan butter in small bowl</li>
  <li>Mix in minced garlic into melted butter</li>
  <li>Coat each slice of bread with melted butter/garlic mixture on baking sheet</li>
  <li>Transfer baking sheet to oven and bake for 10 minutes</li>
  <li>Set oven to broil and bake for 1-2 more min if break is still not golden brown</li>
</ol>
</div>
